Articles.Content: I am a late adopter of breaking ground. just got it after the recent steam sale. I can't imagine this is too uncommon but I can't find info on it. After buying this expansion pack longer missions seem almost impossible. After launching and have a fairly small spacecraft after many stages I am controlling my spacecraft and it just seems to turn to jello. It starts to wobble and just spontaneously explodes. Small wobble turns to uncontrollable wobble, shut off engine and it just keeps on. No preventing it. It just wiggle/wobbles and explodes. I have never had this happen before breaking ground. Maybe this is just a coincidence, at least I hope. 1500 hours, no mods, and this happens within a few hours of breaking ground. I have been crazy busy with work for quite some time so I wouldn't know anyway. I know a company bought the game recently but I hope they didn't just screw it up. Right?  Thanks

Use mostly Grandparent.You turn them on with Advanced Tweakables at settings.

This does sound like the ''Kraken'' attacks.Try also verifying the files on Steam, there might be something corrupted.
